title: (x) What is the 2006 logo font of Abduzeedo / spurless ultra-square sans - Clicker {Marc O}
content: Attached is the first Abduzeedo logo (2006). I haven't identified this font, but found that Advent shares some similarities with it. Please help in my quest to find this font.
author: showboy1080

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110707112803im_/http:/typophile.com/files/first_logo_5327.png)

If you're referring to this logo, it's Clicker from Font Bureau.
Sorry. I forgot about the attachment. Thanks, Marcox!
